name: peddling
content:

present participle of
peddle
to sell things, especially by taking them to different places: These products are generally peddled (from) door to door. He travels around, peddling his wares.

If you peddle stories or information, you spread them by telling different people: The organization has peddled the myth that they are supporting the local population.
